comments.comments_text: Now Southampton have a corner.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Now [TEAM] have a corner.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Connor Roberts (Burnley) is teed up on the edge of the box by Josh Brownhill, and his howitzer of a shot inside the left post gives the keeper no chance. 1:0.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Goal! [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is teed up on the edge of the box by [PLAYER], and his howitzer of a shot inside the left post gives the keeper no chance. 1:0.

comments.comments_text: Stuart Attwell shows a yellow card to Jack Cork (Burnley), who isn't surprised as the tackle was really hard and late.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [REFEREE] shows a yellow card to [PLAYER] ([TEAM]), who isn't surprised as the tackle was really hard and late.

comments.comments_text: Lyanco (Southampton) was trying to get to the ball but clattered into the legs of the opponent as well. Stuart Attwell blows his whistle for an infringement. A yellow card is awarded to Jack Cork (Burnley).

comments.comments_text: Goal! The corner is whipped in and Nathan Michael Collins (Burnley) is in the right place at the right time, planting his header perfectly into the right side of the goal. He makes it 2:0.
